titleStmt.title: A new description of Paris containing a particular account of all the churches, palaces, monasteries ... with all other remarkable matters in that great and famous city / translated out of French.
Nouvelle description de la ville de Paris. English
titleStmt.author: Brice, Germain, 1652-1727.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Nouvelle description de la ville de Paris.
Attributed to Germain Brice. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
